title.rendered: Virat Kohli’s Statue Unveiled in New York’s Times Square

content.rendered:
As the Men’s T20 International continues in 2024, Virat Kohli’s streak against the United States appears on a life-size screen in Times Square.

Virat Kohli, the Indian maverick hitter, is popular not only in his homeland. The United States enthusiastically declared its proud status as a foreign member of Kohli’s fan club by unveiling a life-size statue of the charismatic and versatile star in New York’s Times Square. Kohli’s status as an undisputed powerhouse and a key player in the Indian squad for the 2024 World Cup has translated from his confidence. But also his status as one of the world’s greatest cricketers all in the last ten years.

In a video that is currently going viral on social media, Kohli’s best as a player is reflected in life-size footage and a striking landmark in New York’s Times Square. How was this born? Kohli’s long tenure as a brand ambassador for the Duroflex mattress company brought this unique promotional campaign to life. Duroflex wrote on X/Twitter: “Revealed: A larger-than-life statue of Virat Kohli, often called ‘The King’ by his fans, in Times Square.”

This King’s work, we are going all over the world and making history!

We are giving Virat Kohli good sleep and good health.”

The incredible fan support for the global captain came in the form of comments. With no end of Kohli lovers declaring him the ‘GOAT’.
